thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-FastPartner Adjusts Its Financial Targets And Financial Policy

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FastPartner Adjusts Its Financial Targets And Financial Policy
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - FASTPARTNER AB:
* ‍FASTPARTNER ADJUSTS ITS FINANCIAL TARGETS AND ITS FINANCIAL POLICY
* RETURN ON EQUITY DURING FIVE-YEAR PERIOD TO AMOUNT TO AT LEAST 15 PERCENT PER YEAR
* FINANCIAL GOAL TO INCREASE PROFIT FROM PROPERTY MANAGEMENT PER COMMON SHARE WITH 10 PERCENT PR YEAR
* UPDATED FINANCIAL POLICY: INTEREST COVERAGE RATIO SHALL EXCEED 2.0 TIMES​
* UPDATED FINANCIAL POLICY: ‍NET DEBT IN RELATION TO EBITDA SHALL BE LESS THAN 10 TIMES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
